name: Lavender Latte
description: Lavender lattes are the perfect blend of calming, sweet, and creamy. They can be served hot or iced making them excellent for any type of weather!

ingredients.ingredient: dried lavender (can use lavender extract as well)

directions: Bring water to a boil, add dried lavender (or extract) and sugar.
Stir sugar, lavender, water and reduce heat until liquid becomes more of a syrup.
Add 1-2 tablespoons of lavender syrup to strong coffee and add milk to enjoy!
